about_the_game:
DESCRIPTION:

In Pinnacle Point, Aron is on a desperate mission to search for his lost brother who got tangled up with a sinister corporation that claims to offer a solution for immortality. As he infiltrates their ranks, he uncovers a horrifying truth: their version of eternal life comes at a great cost. Aron must navigate this treacherous world, risking his own soul, to save his brother from a fate worse than death.

NOTE:

This game is actively being worked on. Gameplay, screenshots and trailers might change.

FEATURES:

  • Survival Horror Gameplay with Modern elements: Navigate the eerie island with a blend of exploration, puzzle-solving, and strategic combat. Resources are scarce, and encounters with the grotesque inhabitants is a tense, life-or-death struggle.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: The game employs a cinematic blend of dynamic and fixed camera angles, enhancing the suspenseful, immersive experience. Dense fog, flickering lights, and unsettling sounds keep you constantly on edge.

  • Environmental Storytelling: Discover the island’s dark secrets through cryptic notes, fragmented memories, and environmental cues.

  • Psychological Horror: The line between reality and nightmare blurs as you delve deeper into the corporation’s experiments and your brother’s fate. Voice acting and meticulously crafted environments build a world steeped in atmospheric horror.

ABOUT THE AUTHOR:

Pinnacle Point is a passion project from me, Robin Shen, the solo developer behind Ready2Run Games.

After 15+ years working as a software developer, I’ve channeled my love for storytelling and technology into creating games. Pinnacle Point is my biggest project yet, combining psychological horror, survival elements, and a deeply personal narrative that explores memory, self-discovery, and fear.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or above
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You must uncover the truth that lured your brother into a corporation’s twisted promise of eternal life. On an island steeped in shadows and secrets, you’ll fight to survive, solve haunting mysteries, and confront a past better left forgotten. A dark, 1990s-inspired modern survival horror awaits.
